website_summaries.verdict: The Shure SRH145m+ may not be swanky, but it fits well and delivers strong performance for a reasonable price.
pros: The Shure SRH145m+ is an affordable, relatively comfortable on-ear headphone that sounds more expensive, with good detail and accurate tonal balance
It also has an Apple-friendly integrated inline remote/microphone for making calls and the headphones have a two-year warranty
cons: Design is a bit generic, and the finish on the headband is prone to getting scratched up since no carrying case is included

website_summaries.verdict: Shure's excellent, yet affordable, SRH145m+ headphones offer a balanced response with rich, natural bass.
pros: Powerful audio performance with rich, natural bass and crisp highs

customer_reviews.title: They do not disappoint. They're comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: After loving my Beats for years, they finally broke and I couldn't afford to replace them. I decided to search google for a decent set of headphones for under $100 and these popped up on a couple of sites. They do not disappoint. They're comfortable to wear, adjustable, the sound quality is great, and they're surprisingly good at noise canceling without being advertised as a noise canceling brand. I also like the groovy, minimalist style.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Leizer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: First Shure headphones I've bought. They are NOT Sennheiser(sp) HD600s but I didn't expect that. But for $30, they are great. I was in the hospital for 3 nights after knee replacement. I have a portable Blu-Ray player and these phones sounded great watching, and listening, action movies. RED, Star Trek, and others like that. And they sound good with my MP3 players at the gym, Definitely worth the price and good for general, casual, listening.
customer_reviews.author: Gaines Owen

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for teenagers...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and value! I got this model for my teenage boy and it has worked very well without issues for quite some time now. Great quality, ergonomics and sound production. Highly recommend this one to parents who want a high quality and durable headphone at a reasonable price. As a side note, I have several "audiophile" level premium Shure headphones ($1,000 range) and they are all top of the line and flawless. Shure is a professional and audiophile brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M

customer_reviews.title: did not last
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for basic use around the house when other people were there and didn't want to listen to what I was watching. They lasted for about a year before the ear pieces started breaking down. Around 1.5 years into purchase one of the headphones then stopped working. I think the cable at the L shaped plug in cracked and was damaged. These headphones were not abused. For the price would have expected better quality. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce E.

customer_reviews.title: Amazon rejected my first review?  I still need to tell the truth!
customer_reviews.text: My first review was rejected by Amazon and I was shocked. Because I was just telling my true feeling about the sound quality of this headphone. The sound quality definitely not match the SHURE name. It's like hearing something from a heavily covered radio, unclear muted sound.
customer_reviews.author: xinonnet

customer_reviews.title: Ouch.  Good for only about 1-2 hours.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good, but they hurt my ears after 1-2 hours. These helped me understand I would much rather have over ear headphones than on ear headphones. A cheap pair of maxell headphones were more comfortable than these. I couldn't give less than 3 stars because the remote (145m+) and sound were good
customer_reviews.author: Ageisbike

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and great quality. I'm not an audiophile but this headphones ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy and great quality for the price. I'm not an audiophile but this headphones certainly do the job. If you want headphones you can wear for several hours at the time without feeling like you are wearing a warrior's helmet, these ones are the way to go, Update: like them so much that bought a second pair for my best half.
customer_reviews.author: A Scholar

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent pair of headphones for the sound quality. However, it HURTS your head. Something do to with the angle of the ear pads, or the rigidity of the frame, makes this uncomfortable to wear. For someone like me, who wears headphones all day, this is a bad choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Kempf

customer_reviews.title: Too tight to wear
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good and these headphones have a nice design look. My big beef is they are tight - I guess I have a big head. I wear for short periods then need to give me ears a break. I would have returned but I lost my return window. :-(
customer_reviews.author: LAURA A.

customer_reviews.title: I really like these phones and for the price they can’t be ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these phones and for the price they can’t be beat. All things considered a good buy but if your an audiophile spend some bucks and get an upgrade but I can’t knock these phones.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha

customer_reviews.title: Great price/performance and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: great sounding headphones for the price. looks and feels a little cheap, but hey, they are cheap. very comfortable and works great for phone calls or for computer (VOIP) calls at the office. I primarily use these at work and on the go, while I use the Audio Technica ATH-M50x at home - they cost 3 times more than these and sound a lot better. Not 3 times better, but how do you measure anyway?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality. I was surprised at how good it was. Only complaint is the male part that goes into the headphone jack has an L shape that I've found makes it disconnect from my phone more easily than I'd like if my phone is in my pocket, but this wouldn't deter me from buying this. Also at this pricepoint I felt OK just throwing them in my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: William S Looney

customer_reviews.title: Works OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works OK for the price, but there are much better (more expensive of course) headphones. It came as part of a package with a Mic. Like the mic, but don't really use the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Strodav

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product
customer_reviews.text: If there is a better open headphone at this price, tell me please. This is a really good product. Gives some space to your music, if just listen to music is your thing.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Reesespieces

customer_reviews.title: Average Head Phone
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to write home about. It's just an average no big deal product
customer_reviews.author: J Cal

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: Nice design and good material nice headphone. I don't like the L-shape connector there should be an option for one made straight and in-line by your company.
customer_reviews.author: LDLKnows

customer_reviews.title: Nice affordable headphones with good/great sound
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of affordable headphones. They are comfortable to wear for long periods and sound pretty good. Clear, good bass and can crank the volume. Some have better bass, but overall, these are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Viking Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Money Well Spent
customer_reviews.text: The best $43.00 I have ever spent. I've owned these headphones for about 8 months and use them everyday while walking the dog.These headphones are very comfortable and the sound and noise isolation is very good. This is the first Shure anything that I've purchased so I can't say anything about how they will hold up over time. But if you are trying to decide whether to buy these I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: DEC

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, comfortable with very good sound at a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, comfortable with very good sound at a reasonable price. I bought a pair two years ago after a new pair of headphones I had purchased didn't live up to expectations. Loved the SRH144 and ended up giving the other brand to my husband after his broke. Gifted him with a pair of SRH144 for Christmas and he's one happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: SLouR

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. Shure lives up to its rep
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Shure lives up to its rep. I've sound equip by Shure, mics etc. for live performance for the last 25 years and always pleased. I recommend these for general use, including grand kid survival.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Reader

customer_reviews.title: these sound like $20 headphones
customer_reviews.text: Meh, these sound like $20 headphones. I can't dock off more stars because, well, I paid $22 for them and I say they sound like $20 headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Shane B.

customer_reviews.title: Best wired headphones for price point without a doubt!
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. They are terrific sound and I was willing to do without wireless to get better sound which is always the case with Shure headphones. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Lorinda C

customer_reviews.title: Eh!
customer_reviews.text: Eh! The sound quality wasn’t that great. I commute everyday and when I used this the train noise drowned out the sound.
customer_reviews.author: prange3

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is fine, especially for over the ear headphones
customer_reviews.text: They fold up compactly so you can carry it in your bag without taking up too much room. The sound quality is fine, especially for over the ear headphones. I like them better than my urbanear headphones because they don't squeeze my head, so I can wear them for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Carinne H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny and more
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive but smooth full range sound. Comfortable fit -I can wear them for an hour or two with no comfort issues. Probably comfortable longer but that is as long as I usually listen. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: midfi

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for value
customer_reviews.text: I gave the earphones five stars for value. I have used good quality earphones over the years, so I know what sound quality I'm looking for. My Last set went out and I decided to look at the best value for lower priced earphones. These were highly rated in a magazine article and I decided to buy them. Again for the value, very good sound quality, especially the bass, good looking and very comfortable. My wife loves them. Looks like we are buying another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to wear while working at the office
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to wear while working at the office. My ears are pretty sensitive to this kind of items but somehow I'm able to wear it almost the whole day at work. It doesn't apply too much pressure in my ears. I will love it more if with the purchase they will give you a case.
customer_reviews.author: Mimego

customer_reviews.title: Sad to see shure not doing so well
customer_reviews.text: This is def underpriced. Incredible sound quality and priced so well. Everyone should own one at their home. Sad to see shure not doing so well.
customer_reviews.author: Euna J

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These Headphones are very comfortable and have great sound quality. Only downside is that other people can hear your music pretty easily because they aren't noise cancelling. I've use them with my yamaha keyboard, my PC, and my ipod with no problems. For only 40 bucks there's no way I can't give these five stars they're awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Norton

customer_reviews.title: Did not think the mediocre sound quality justified the price.
customer_reviews.text: Did not think the mediocre sound quality justified the price; I returned mine for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Dowell

customer_reviews.title: Headphone Jack Broke Upon First Use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my brother's birthday. He was super excited, and opened them almost immediately. When he went to plug them in, the headphone jack snapped in half. I would recommend this poor craftsmanship to nobody. Steer clear of anything Shure as you'll Shure-ly get swindled.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Horseman

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound quality, slightly uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: It does push a little bit too much onto my ears. Decent sound quality, but I have had headphones that have better sound.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great and also the price, i'd like more quality construction, but sound\price is great.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two pairs of these headphones, for me and my wife. We have another headphones, which lacked some basses and so we thought of buying a new pair(s) of headphones for us. I searched some sites, and for the price found these, which had good reviews. I, maybe, don't like the little crispy sound, but low and high frequencies despite the little crispiness.
customer_reviews.author: Susana Somkhieva

customer_reviews.title: Portable
customer_reviews.text: Works great for long plane rides instead of ear buds and folds nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Shure Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for the price, sound is clean, compact & can wear for hours
customer_reviews.author: Jackster

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I work in a call center and wanted to block out noise while I had to do trainings on my computer. They work great at blocking out most of the surrounding noise and sound great. I'd highly recommend them especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Carr

customer_reviews.title: I use this to listen to solfeggio sound healing music on my iPhone!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! I use it listen to solfeggio sound healing music on my iPhone!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: It's what you expect from Shure.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and great price. It's a Shure so you know you are getting a great product.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Not match what i was thinking for SHURE
customer_reviews.text: FOR SHURE.... the sound didn't comes out clearly... didn't match my expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Y.W. Sung

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've ever owned. They can handle nearly triple the wattage the manufacturer recommends before distorting. When you push around double their recommended wattage they sound excellent. No mobile device or laptop will provide enough power.
customer_reviews.author: MasaG4

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with these for Shure.
customer_reviews.text: I had seen these on a review and was looking for an inexpensive pair of headphones that I didn't need to look after so much. The bass is nice and deep and you can also hear other things that you previously were unaware of in your music collection. The folding clasps are also really good quality. All in all really nice. However I'm not such a fan of the dual cord design would have preferred single cord.
customer_reviews.author: Abid Aziz

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: They are great. No problems so far. Love the fact they fold up making them easy to take when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: AgelessVoice

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These sound great, especially considering the price. They are also comfortable. Two small knocks against them. One, I wish they were a little tighter as they can slide a bit. Two, it would be nice if the wire were only out of one side instead of both so it didn't get tangled as easily. Again, for the price I recommend these no question.
customer_reviews.author: Lauryn

customer_reviews.title: It worths the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a great headphone for the price, with enough bass level if you plan to use it to listen to R&R, R&B, blues, jazz, funk and such styles. Not shure how it will deal with EDM styles, but again, it's a bang for the buck. Easy to fold, with a long cable. A good companion for my daily Starbucks trips.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo F. Silva

customer_reviews.title: Works great. My ears hurt after about 90 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My ears hurt after about 90 minutes. Having a cable on each ear instead of one wire for the entire headset is also slightly annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Good headphone
customer_reviews.text: It’s an affordable headphone with decent sound quality and comfortable wearing experience.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J

customer_reviews.title: Ok sounding, my JBL 8 dollar head phones are much better
customer_reviews.text: Ok head phones, not great I would give them an average rating for sound quality. My JBL cheap in ear head phones are definitely better quality.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: ... 6 ~ 11) use them regularly and seem to like 'em. They (the headphones) are a year old ...
customer_reviews.text: My 4 grandkids (ages 6 ~ 11) use them regularly and seem to like 'em. They (the headphones) are a year old and haven't broken yet. What other testimony do you need?
customer_reviews.author: Ronald P. Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These sound great and hold up to my (ab)use. Cable is good and long for using at the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and sound.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of these headphones we have bought. The first pair is now a year old, used on a daily basis, and still working fine.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: too big:(
customer_reviews.text: These were far too big for my head, so the cups didn't sit properly and leaked noise. Looked super sleek but not great for small heads.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hussain

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable; they hurt your ears when you use them
customer_reviews.author: Patrick DiGiovanni

customer_reviews.title: Damn
customer_reviews.text: For the money, it's worth buying. Someone was sitting right next to me talking and I could see their mouth moving but couldn't hear a word. The sound is clear and nice. bass is deep and impressive for the headphones. Happy I was recommended these. A little tight on my head but I can deal with that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. Block out most outside noise, sound quality is good. Stay on well at gym.
customer_reviews.author: smart_shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love them and the look
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They look expensive but aren't and I think they sound great and I have Bose and Beats(that are broken).
customer_reviews.author: baw53

customer_reviews.title: Great Bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing for their price and you definitely get your moneys worth. I'm no Audiophile but I do know quality sound when I hear it. Pros: -Clear and rich sound -Very light and portable -Comfortable to wear ( I have a huge head and these fit me great) -Wire isn't too long just 5ft long -Just enough bass isn't over powering. Cons: -Bass isn't it's strong point, may disappoint fans of Hip Hop, EDM music etc -Silver headband looks a bit toyish -A little flimsy, feels like it could break easily If your looking for a solid pair of headphones for traveling or light use these are for you! Great quality sound comfortable, definitely solid headphones from Shure!
customer_reviews.author: William Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Perfect headphones for daily use !
customer_reviews.text: Especially for children to use at school and at home.
customer_reviews.author: Faizan

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations for the money
customer_reviews.text: FOR THE MONEY, there is nothing to complain about here. Excellent comfort, no ear fatigue, great sound.
customer_reviews.author: George Glass

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not all-day headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound. Comfortable across the head. Moderately blocks outside noise. But I can't wear them all day, though-- starts to hurt my ears after about 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hutkins

customer_reviews.title: Comfort with great sound.
customer_reviews.text: I just returned from an international trip with flight legs of 12 hours or more and wore these comfortably for the entire trip. I will never go back to "in ear" phones and in fact these are "on ear" which make them even more comfortable. they kind of have a pillow like your pad rather than a cup it's very comfortable and blocks out the noise. They are a great sound they fold up and are perfect for travel at the right price no need for multi hundred dollar fancy sets. Shure never fails to make fantastic sounding headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart W Sayre

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A very well designed system for the money. See my complete review under the SRH145m+
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Low volume
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and durable if careful. Volume a bit low but worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Santisway

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but sounds poor
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty headset but....I bought these for the sound. I knew that I was taking a chance in purchasing these without first hearing them. I was trusting the reviews and taking a chance. The sound is not crystal clear or clean; the volume needs to be raised in order to compensate for the flat sound. I will be returning this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for a fair price. Very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: John Lenore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, clear sound - excellent bass. Warning: do not lend to girlfriends, or you will not get them back.
customer_reviews.author: andy schulz

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good, very good for this price point
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good, very good for this price point. The integrated mic and volume controls are nice - if you get a call you don't have to take them off to answer. For the money these won't disappoint - if you're looking for Beats, then understand that passive (unpowered) headphones will cost a lot more to match the specs of headphones that have internal power source.
customer_reviews.author: S. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Nice headphones with a very decent audio quality, I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: duc

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the sound quality was not that great, but other than that, it did it's job
customer_reviews.author: nal

customer_reviews.title: Shure SRH145m+ headphone review
customer_reviews.text: Tonal response seems very adequate for the genres of music I listen to & quality of construction good for this price point. Comfort is only issue I have, but overall I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Corgey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, but not that stylish, but great for watching movies
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Read a CNET review of this and its very comfortable to wear, I can wear it all day
customer_reviews.author: R.L.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beware: Puts a lot of pressure on wide/square heads. Could not listen with for that long.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Recommend totally!
customer_reviews.text: Before I purchased these I was going through a new set of headphones about every two months, this are terrific, comfortable, and they have a two year warranty as well! It is now almost a year since purchasing and I am still using the same headphones. My 4 year old granddaughter and 6 year old grandson also use them when they visit. To say I am pleased is not even coming close!
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Boo

customer_reviews.title: great headphones! love them
customer_reviews.text: great headphones! love them, great sound, quality and comfort. sometimes my hair gets stuck in the part that folds but I'm aware of it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Greatest headphones I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great! Very comfortable, the way the Jack is made is a little weird, but still a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Herrera

customer_reviews.title: My poor ears get bloodshot and bruised after about an hour
customer_reviews.text: So uncomfortable for long use. My poor ears get bloodshot and bruised after about an hour. Regret purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Citypeep

customer_reviews.title: way below average
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is marginal - sounds flat. Mic was inoperable right out of the box. I just sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Alistair Zebulon

customer_reviews.title: And it took two weeks for them to feel comfortable without my ears being numb
customer_reviews.text: The sound is already going out on the right ear 40 days in. And it took two weeks for them to feel comfortable without my ears being numb. Would never order again.
customer_reviews.author: Madi R

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Big disappointment. I sent them back. Cheaply made and poor sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: These have good sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: These have good sound for the price, but I found them uncomfortable. Another reviewer said the sound pressure was unpleasant and apparently that was what bothered me. I felt relief when removing them.
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: OK headphones but not the best looks.
customer_reviews.text: OK sound for the price. I'm not a fan of the chrome headband...I might buy the SRH 144 {open type) - better looks and probably better imaging....
customer_reviews.author: roberto torres

customer_reviews.title: Another sure thing from Shure
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding. Clean, crisp, tight sound with nice warm bass. Fine at any price, awesome for 40 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Sung

customer_reviews.title: Good for phone calls and music
customer_reviews.text: I picked these up to use as an alternate to Bluetooth when talking on the phone for hours. It took a few days to get used to, but works very well. Volume is good for people who might have enjoyed music very loud in the past but need to hear quiet people or sounds today.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: but I didn't like the shape
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headphones, but I didn't like the shape. The sound quality is good and the brand is excellent. I returned it and bought another Shure headphones (in a different model).
customer_reviews.author: Fabiane

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good price, The quality seems about right. good for classics, musicals.
customer_reviews.author: parksumi

customer_reviews.title: These are great headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones for the price. They're comfortable and stay comfortable for over 1 hour. The sound is clear; especially low notes which I sometimes have difficulty hearing on stereo. I use them to listen to audio books while I'm commuting to and from work. Easy to adjust I haven't listened to music with them, so I can't comment on that. I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C. Strachan

customer_reviews.title: Not really a one size fits all
customer_reviews.text: sound was okay but they aren't very comfy. They didn't adjust down to my head size
customer_reviews.author: Amy Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: I have $10 earbuds that sound better. Lifeless and very shallow sound.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Bummer!!
customer_reviews.text: The product came on time and feels good but for some reason it does not look like a brand new piece. There are some scratched on it. Really disappointed as I don't have time to return and then again wait for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Deepak Taunk

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Returned as a duplicate gift. Did not have the opportunity to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Zinn

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. I wear it at the gym or ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I wear it at the gym or when walking the dog. Good sound and very comfortable. And so far indestructible. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TEM

customer_reviews.title: They are OK!  But think of what type of sound you want first!
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting them to be a level 10, based on their price. However, I was expecting more like a level 5. Instead, I got a level 3. However, that may be my fault, because I was looking for a lightweight set of headphones that had a decent amount of bass. The fact that I did not get the SRH145's with the closed back, is probably why I am getting a little more airy sound than I'd like. A closed design by its nature would have produced a more solid mid-range and bass.
customer_reviews.author: ATLMIALASICN

customer_reviews.title: These are absolutely terrific! Unbelievable sound quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely terrific! Unbelievable sound quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Ahlborn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed I couldn't return as it has been 60 days.
customer_reviews.text: I'd pass on these, the skullcandy phones at the same price are much better with regards to comfort and sound.
customer_reviews.author: JBinA2

customer_reviews.title: WORST HEADPHONE EVER PURCHASED_DON"T BUY
customer_reviews.text: This headphone is a piece of JUNK. Bad sound, BAD quality, BAD plug in, BAD static, BAD EVERYTHING!! No quality control, no testing no nothing!!! A complete waste of time-DON'T BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: jumpy

product_meta.title: Shure SRH145m+ Portable Collapsible Headphones with Remote and Microphone Compatible with All Apple iOS Devices
product_meta.description: Style:Closed Back with Remote and MicShure SRH145M+ Portable Headphones with Remote and Mic
feature_bullets: Rich deep bass with full range audio
Closed-back, on-ear design provides good external noise isolation and comfortable fit
Ultra-lightweight, collapsible design for easy storage and on-the-go-use
Adjustable ear cups and padded headband ensure ergonomic and secure fit
Legendary Shure quality from the brand trusted for music history’s greatest moments, plus a two year manufacturer's warranty covers free replacement or repair

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars289 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
